trans-unit.source: Provides random access to unmanaged blocks of memory from managed code.
trans-unit.target: 從 Managed 程式碼對 Unmanaged 記憶體區塊提供隨機存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor%2A> method of a <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile> object returns the unmanaged blocks of memory for working with views of memory-mapped files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateViewAccessor%2A>方法<xref:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile>物件傳回 unmanaged 的記憶體對應檔的檢視所使用的記憶體區塊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to contain the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 包含存取子的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte at which to start the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 存取子會在此處開始的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of memory to allocate.
trans-unit.target: 要配置的記憶體大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> class with a specified buffer, offset, and capacity.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的緩衝區、位移和容量，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="capacity" /> is greater than <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="capacity" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="capacity" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="capacity" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="capacity" /> would wrap around the high end of the address space.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="capacity" /> 會環繞高端的位址空間。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to contain the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 包含存取子的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte at which to start the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 存取子會在此處開始的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of memory to allocate.
trans-unit.target: 要配置的記憶體大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The type of access allowed to the memory.
trans-unit.target: 允許的記憶體存取類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess.ReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess.ReadWrite" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> class with a specified buffer, offset, capacity, and access right.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的緩衝區、位移、容量和存取權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="capacity" /> is greater than <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="capacity" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="capacity" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="capacity" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="access" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="capacity" /> would wrap around the high end of the address space.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="capacity" /> 會環繞高端的位址空間。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the accessor is readable.
trans-unit.target: 判斷存取子是否可讀取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the accessor is readable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存取子是可讀取的，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the accessory is writable.
trans-unit.target: 判斷存取子是否可寫入。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the accessor is writable; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存取子是可寫入的，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 取得存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 使用的資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" />.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 所使用的所有資源。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to contain the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 包含存取子的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte at which to start the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 存取子會在此處開始的位元組。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of memory to allocate.
trans-unit.target: 要配置的記憶體大小 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The type of access allowed to the memory.
trans-unit.target: 允許的記憶體存取類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess.ReadWrite" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess.ReadWrite" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the initial values for the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 設定存取子的初始值。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the constructors for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的建構函式會呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="capacity" /> is greater than <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="capacity" /> 大於 <paramref name="buffer" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="capacity" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="capacity" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="access" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFileAccess" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> plus <paramref name="capacity" /> would wrap around the high end of the address space.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 加上 <paramref name="capacity" /> 會環繞高端的位址空間。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the accessor is currently open by a process.
trans-unit.target: 判斷存取子目前是否由處理程序開啟。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the accessor is open; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果存取子已開啟，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of structure.
trans-unit.target: 結構的型別。

trans-unit.source: The position in the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 要在存取子中開始讀取的位置。

trans-unit.source: The structure to contain the read data.
trans-unit.target: 包含讀取資料的結構。

trans-unit.source: Reads a structure of type <paramref name="T" /> from the accessor into a provided reference.
trans-unit.target: 將型別 <paramref name="T" /> 的結構從存取子讀入至提供的參考。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to read medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other read methods in this class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來讀取的中型到大型的結構，不會輕易地容納的這個類別中的其他讀取方法。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read in a structure of type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後沒有足夠的位元組可讀取型別 <paramref name="T" /> 的結構。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<see langword="T" /> is a value type that contains one or more reference types.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="T" /> 是包含一個或多個參考型別的實值型別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The type of structure.
trans-unit.target: 結構的型別。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes in the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 要在存取子中開始讀取的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The array to contain the structures read from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 陣列，包含從存取子讀取的結構。

trans-unit.source: The index in <c>array</c> in which to place the first copied structure.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>array</c> 中放置第一個複製結構的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of structures of type <c>T</c> to read from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 要從存取子讀取的類型 <c>T</c> 的結構數目。

trans-unit.source: Reads structures of type <paramref name="T" /> from the accessor into an array of type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 將型別 <paramref name="T" /> 的結構從存取子讀入至型別 <paramref name="T" /> 的陣列。

trans-unit.source: The number of structures read into <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: 讀入至 <paramref name="array" /> 的結構數目。

trans-unit.source: This value can be less than <paramref name="count" /> if there are fewer structures available, or zero if the end of the accessor is reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供較少的結構，則這個值可能小於 <paramref name="count" />，如果已經到達存取子結尾，則為零。

trans-unit.source: This method is not safe.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不安全。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is not large enough to contain <paramref name="count" /> of structures (starting from <paramref name="position" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 不夠大，無法包含結構 (從 <paramref name="count" /> 開始) 的 <paramref name="position" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a Boolean value from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取布林值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> or <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 或 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read a value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a byte value from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取位元組值。

trans-unit.source: The value that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read a value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a character from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取位元組值。

trans-unit.source: The value that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read a value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a decimal value from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取位元組值。

trans-unit.source: The value that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read a value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The decimal to read is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 讀取的十進位無效。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 小於零或大於這個存取子的容量。

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a double-precision floating-point value from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取雙精確度浮點數值。

trans-unit.source: The value that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read a value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> is less than zero or greater than the capacity of the accessor.

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a 16-bit integer from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取 16 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The value that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的值。

trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 會在此處開始讀取存取子的位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a 32-bit integer from the accessor.
trans-unit.target: 從存取子讀取 32 位元整數。

trans-unit.source: The value that was read.
trans-unit.target: 已讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes after <paramref name="position" /> to read a value.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，沒有足夠的位元組可讀取值。

trans-unit.source: The accessor does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 存取子不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The accessor has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 存取子已經被處置。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes into the accessor at which to begin reading.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to write medium to large structures that are not easily accommodated by the other <xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor.Write%2A> methods in this class.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來撰寫不會輕易地容納其他的中型到大型結構<xref:System.IO.UnmanagedMemoryAccessor.Write%2A>此類別中的方法。

trans-unit.source: There are not enough bytes in the accessor after <paramref name="position" /> to write a structure of type <paramref name="T" />.
trans-unit.target: 在 <paramref name="position" /> 之後，存取子中沒有足夠的位元組可以寫入型別 <paramref name="T" /> 的結構。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
